lines.content: Hi I'm a second year Computer Engineering student in CS2113!
So far I'm working on saving data feature and editing saved data features. As our project progresses, this will change.

* Main entry-point for the InternSprint application.
public abstract class AddCommand extends Command {

public static final String COMMAND_WORD = "add hardware";
public static final String MESSAGE_USAGE = COMMAND_WORD + ": Adds a hardware internship to the internship list.\n"
+ "    Example: " + COMMAND_WORD + " /c Google " + "/r Hardware Engineer " + "/tech C, C++";
public static final String COMMAND_WORD = "add software";
public static final String MESSAGE_USAGE = COMMAND_WORD + ": Adds a software internship to the internship list.\n"
+ "    Example: " + COMMAND_WORD + " /c Google " + "/r Software Engineer " + "/tech Java, Python";
